scripts.test: tslint -p tsconfig.json -c tslint.json && nyc -x tst -e .ts --temp-directory coverage/nyc-output -r html -r text-summary -r cobertura ./node_modules/.bin/_mocha --require ./node_modules/ts-node/register/index.js 'tst/**/*.spec.ts' --reporter nyan
scripts.build: rimraf dist && tsc && claudia pack --force --output dist/bundle.zip
